content: pot of pansies by le&ce rose an unashamedly floral square celebrabng spring and summer pots and hanging baskets you can really go to town with a riot of colours for a mixed pot of pansies or make all the flowers the same for more restrained elegance the flowers are worked separately then incorporated into the background i really wanted to play with the idea of flowers that are not totally symmetrical pansies have five overlapping petals the bokom one is the largest semi split and a kind of double petal i have lel it to you whether the actual flowers line up neatly around the bowl or are just thrown in giggling and jiggling pot of pansies copyright 2025 le6ce rose size sample is in stylecral special dk and a 3 5 mm hook producing 9 25 square worsted and a 5 mm hook should come out around 12 the final sbtch count of 39 sbtches per side colours yarn a - meadow yarn b lavender yarn c - lemon yarn d - walnut yarn e - dark brown yarn f parma violet s-tches and abbrevia-ons used 2dccl - two double_crochet cluster 3dccl - three double_crochet cluster 3trcl -
